conditions.short_description: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the Eastfjords.
conditions.full_description: A warm spell earlier this week has reduced snow in some areas, but wind slabs remain in the North and Eastfjords. Moderate to heavy snowfall is forecast for Thursday and Friday, which could lead to further slab formation, particularly in the Eastfjords.

area_forecast.forecast: Not much snow at low elevations but isolated and small slabs could be present at the highest elevations.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Not much snow at lower elevations. Snowfall and blowing snow was over last weekend so isolated and small wind slabs could be present at the highest elevations.
area_forecast.weather: Snjóar lítillega í norðaustan átt til fjalla á fimmtudag og aðfararnótt föstudags.

area_forecast.forecast: Wind slabs have formed in the mountains. A small avalanche released in Litlahryggsgil on Sunday.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: An avalanche released in Litlahryggsgil above Flateyri on Nov 30.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Small wind slabs have formed and more slabs are expected to forom in the next few days in snowfall and drifting snow, especially on W-facing slopes. It has thawed at lower elevations and little snow is in the area in general but it will snow in the next few days.
area_forecast.weather: Hvassar A/NA-áttir næstu daga og snjókoma með köflum til fjalla en slydda við sjávarmál. Hlýnar dálítið á föstudag en áfram frost hátt til fjalla.

area_forecast.forecast: Small wind slabs are likely present on all aspects. Moderate snowfall is forecasted on Thursday and Friday in low Northeasterly winds. Additional wind slab formation is expected on Southern aspects.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Last week, there was moderate snowfall in the mountains, and small wind slabs formed in all aspects at higher elevations. With increased snowfall next Thursday and Friday, slab formation can be expected on Southern aspects.
area_forecast.weather: Ríkjandi norðaustanátt næstu daga með talsverðri snjókomu frá fimmtudegi til föstudags. Hlýnar um helgina og verður frostlaust hátt til fjalla.

area_forecast.forecast: New snow is in the area and wind slabs, which are unstable at first.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: A few small avalanches released in Norðfjörður on Nov 29th.
area_forecast.snow_condition: New snow is in the area and wind slabs which are likely unstable at first. NE winds in the next few days with intermittent snow and drifting snow so more wind slab formation is expected, especially on S-W aspects. Becoming warmer on Friday with rain at lower elevations but snow at very high elevations.
area_forecast.weather: Hvöss NA-átt og snjókoma á fimmtudag. Hlýnar dálítið á föstudag og laugardag með rigningu á láglendi en snjókomu hátt til fjalla.

weather_forecast.forecast: NE-erly winds and snow in many parts of the country, but especially in the Eastfjords. Becoming warmer on Friday and Saturday.
